Our Products: for Accelerated Analytics & Insight Generation

CHORD

Cross-Channel Hospital OP Reimbursement Dashboard

CHORD is a comprehensive analytics-ready database of reimbursement rates by product, procedure, channel, payer, health system and hospital.

BASIS

Brand Access Strategy Impact Simulator

Brand Access Strategy Impact Simulator (BASIS) is a structure-driven simulation tool to quantify impact of access shifts on brand utilization & GTN

LARA

Launch Analog Recommendation Agent

Launch Analog Recommendation Agent (LARA) is an AI-enabled tool to identify analog drugs to plan and benchmark launch access and performance
